name: Innis Gambit
description:
Welcome to Innis Gambit, a game of execution, tactics, and skill.

(Note: this game requires Gamepads)

Your team consists of:

  • A Mage, who can
    • Move quickly
    • Fire a bolt of electricity to deal damage at a distance
  • A Knight, who can
    • Move farther ranges, at slower speeds
    • Execute devastating shortrange kill moves
  • A Defender, who can
    • Move slowly
    • Place walls that can withstand attacks and block movement
      • Crush enemies with walls at mid-range

Strong positioning, quick reactions, and multitasking ability are rewarded greatly. Protect your Base Crystal at all costs.
